input.sentences: i had a great time on vacation last year .
it was during winter . i had to use public transportation .
i got to see a lot of the city .
at night i would stay in my hotel .
output.sentences: It was time to go on our holidays.
We got the map of London out to plan our day.
Then we got on a double decker bus for a sight seeing tour.
Afterwards we went in search of our accommodation for the night.
